title: Authors and Citation
text: Thomas M (2025). ffiec: R Interface 'FFIEC Central Data Repository REST API' Service. R package version 0.1.3, https://github.com/ketchbrookanalytics/ffiec.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ffiec: R Interface to 'FFIEC Central Data Repository REST API' Service},   author = {Michael Thomas},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.3},   url = {https://github.com/ketchbrookanalytics/ffiec}, }

what: R Interface to FFIEC Central Data Repository REST API Service
title: R Interface to FFIEC Central Data Repository REST API Service
text: R package retrieving data FFIEC Central Data Repository Web Service.

title: R Interface to FFIEC Central Data Repository REST API Service
text: {ffiec} can installed CRAN using install.packages("ffiec"). Alternatively can install development version GitHub using {pak} like :

title: R Interface to FFIEC Central Data Repository REST API Service
text: order use {ffiec}, first need create account FFIEC’s Web Service portal, provide User ID Token must provided function R package. Note Token password FFIEC Web Service account.

title: R Interface to FFIEC Central Data Repository REST API Service
text: August 25, 2025, authentication FFIEC Central Data Repository requires Multifactor Authentication via Microsoft Entra ID. Organizations don’t already Microsoft Entra identity provider (IDP) choose one following options create account: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/microsoft-365-business https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/account-billing/--create--new-microsoft-account-a84675c3-3e9e-17cf-2911-3d56b15c0aaf

title: R Interface to FFIEC Central Data Repository REST API Service
text: username password, recommend setting environment variables FFIEC_USER_ID FFIEC_BEARER_TOKEN. Perhaps easiest way create .Renviron file root project like : Note: credentials example values work – must replaced valid User ID Token values. prefer set environment variables, can pass FFIEC Web Service User ID Token values user_id bearer_token arguments available function {ffiec}.

title: R Interface to FFIEC Central Data Repository REST API Service
text: Though FFIEC Web Service returns data different formats (e.g., XBRL, semicolon-delimited, etc.), {ffiec} returns data tibble easy downstream analysis.
code: library(ffiec)  # Retrieve filers since 2025-03-31, as of 2025-04-15 21:00:00.000 and return # as a tibble get_filers_since_date(   reporting_period_end_date = "03/31/2025",   last_update_date_time = "04/15/2025 21:00:00.000",   as_data_frame = TRUE ) |>   head() #> # A tibble: 6 × 1 #>   ID_RSSD #>     <int> #> 1  783648 #> 2  562058 #> 3 2745529 #> 4  644057 #> 5 3316739 #> 6 3282012 # Retrieve facsimile data for reporting period 2025-03-31 for instutition # with ID RSSD "480228" get_facsimile(   reporting_period_end_date = "03/31/2025",   fi_id = 480228 ) |>   head() #> # A tibble: 6 × 8 #>   CallDate   BankRSSDIdentifier MDRM     Value     LastUpdate ShortDefinition    #>   <date>                  <int> <chr>    <chr>     <date>     <chr>              #> 1 2025-03-31             480228 RCFA3792 209624000 2025-08-28 Total capital (su… #> 2 2025-03-31             480228 RCFA5310 14397000  2025-08-28 Adjusted allowanc… #> 3 2025-03-31             480228 RCFA5311 15816000  2025-08-28 Tier 2 capital (g… #> 4 2025-03-31             480228 RCFA7204 7.6139%   2025-08-28 Leverage ratio (i… #> 5 2025-03-31             480228 RCFA7205 14.4537%  2025-08-28 Total capital rat… #> 6 2025-03-31             480228 RCFA7206 13.3631%  2025-08-28 Tier 1 capital ra… #> # ℹ 2 more variables: CallSchedule <chr>, LineNumber <chr>

title: R Interface to FFIEC Central Data Repository REST API Service
text: ’re need assistance working {ffiec}, don’t hesitate reach team info@ketchbrookanalytics.com.

title: Retrieve Facsimile — get_facsimile
text: Retrieves Call Report UBPR facsimile data FFIEC Central Data Repository API requested financial institution.

title: Retrieve Facsimile — get_facsimile
code: get_facsimile(   user_id = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_USER_ID"),   bearer_token = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_BEARER_TOKEN"),   reporting_period_end_date,   fi_id_type = c("ID_RSSD", "FDICCertNumber", "OCCChartNumber", "OTSDockNumber"),   fi_id )  get_ubpr_facsimile(   user_id = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_USER_ID"),   bearer_token = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_BEARER_TOKEN"),   reporting_period_end_date,   fi_id_type = c("ID_RSSD", "FDICCertNumber", "OCCChartNumber", "OTSDockNumber"),   fi_id )

title: Retrieve Facsimile — get_facsimile
text: user_id (String) UserID authenticating FFIEC API bearer_token (String) Bearer Token authenticating FFIEC API reporting_period_end_date (String) reporting period end date, formatted "MM/DD/YYYY" fi_id_type (String) type identifier provided; one c("ID_RSSD", "FDICCertNumber", "OCCChartNumber", "OTSDockNumber"); default "ID_RSSD" fi_id (String) financial institution's identifier (can also supplied integer instead string)

title: Retrieve Facsimile — get_facsimile
text: tibble containing facsimile data.

title: Retrieve Facsimile — get_facsimile
text: https://cdr.ffiec.gov/public/Files/SIS611_-_Retrieve_Public_Data_via_Web_Service.pdf

title: Retrieve Facsimile — get_facsimile
code: if (!no_creds_available()) {   # Assume you have set the following environment variables:   # - FFIEC_USER_ID   # - FFIEC_BEARER_TOKEN    # Retrieve facsimile data for reporting period 2025-03-31 for institution   # with ID RSSD "480228"   get_facsimile(     reporting_period_end_date = "03/31/2025",     fi_id = 480228   )    # Retrieve UBPR facsimile data for reporting period 2025-03-31 for   # instutition with FDIC Cert Number "3510"   get_ubpr_facsimile(     reporting_period_end_date = "03/31/2025",     fi_id_type = "FDICCertNumber",     fi_id = "3510"   ) }

title: Retrieve Filers Since Date — get_filers_since_date
text: Retrieves filer information FFIEC Central Data Repository API filers updated since specified date.

title: Retrieve Filers Since Date — get_filers_since_date
code: get_filers_since_date(   user_id = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_USER_ID"),   bearer_token = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_BEARER_TOKEN"),   reporting_period_end_date,   last_update_date_time,   as_data_frame = FALSE )

title: Retrieve Filers Since Date — get_filers_since_date
text: user_id (String) UserID authenticating FFIEC API bearer_token (String) Bearer Token authenticating FFIEC API reporting_period_end_date (String) reporting period end date, formatted "MM/DD/YYYY". last_update_date_time (String) Filter records updated since date/time. See Details formatting options. as_data_frame (Logical) result returned tibble? Default FALSE.

title: Retrieve Filers Since Date — get_filers_since_date
text: list containing parsed JSON response API, element list represents RSSD ID value.  as_data_frame = TRUE, list converted tibble (returned ).

title: Retrieve Filers Since Date — get_filers_since_date
text: Set last_update_date_time value last time ran method retrieve institutions filed newer report. Possible formatting options include: "04/15/2025" "2025-04-15 21:00:00.000" "04/15/2025 9:00 PM"

title: Retrieve Filers Since Date — get_filers_since_date
text: https://cdr.ffiec.gov/public/Files/SIS611_-_Retrieve_Public_Data_via_Web_Service.pdf

title: Retrieve Filers Since Date — get_filers_since_date
code: if (!no_creds_available()) {   # Assume you have set the following environment variables:   # - FFIEC_USER_ID   # - FFIEC_BEARER_TOKEN    # Retrieve filers since 2025-03-31, as of 2025-04-15 and return as a list   get_filers_since_date(     reporting_period_end_date = "03/31/2025",     last_update_date_time = "04/15/2025"   )    # Retrieve filers since 2025-03-31, as of 2025-04-15 21:00:00.000 and return   # as a tibble   get_filers_since_date(     reporting_period_end_date = "03/31/2025",     last_update_date_time = "04/15/2025 21:00:00.000",     as_data_frame = TRUE   ) }

what: Retrieve Filers Submission Date Time — get_filers_submission_datetime
title: Retrieve Filers Submission Date Time — get_filers_submission_datetime
text: Retrieves filer information FFIEC Central Data Repository API ID RSSDs submission date time reporters filed provided `last_update_date_time“ whose new filings available public distribution.

title: Retrieve Filers Submission Date Time — get_filers_submission_datetime
code: get_filers_submission_datetime(   user_id = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_USER_ID"),   bearer_token = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_BEARER_TOKEN"),   reporting_period_end_date,   last_update_date_time,   as_data_frame = TRUE )

title: Retrieve Filers Submission Date Time — get_filers_submission_datetime
text: user_id (String) UserID authenticating FFIEC API bearer_token (String) Bearer Token authenticating FFIEC API reporting_period_end_date (String) reporting period end date, formatted "MM/DD/YYYY". last_update_date_time (String) Filter records updated since date/time. See Details formatting options. as_data_frame (Logical) result returned tibble? Default FALSE.

title: Retrieve Filers Submission Date Time — get_filers_submission_datetime
text: list containing parsed JSON response API, element list represents RSSD ID value.  as_data_frame = TRUE, list converted tibble (returned ).

title: Retrieve Filers Submission Date Time — get_filers_submission_datetime
text: Set last_update_date_time value last time ran method retrieve institutions filed newer report. Possible formatting options include: "04/15/2025" "04/15/2025 9:00 PM"

title: Retrieve Filers Submission Date Time — get_filers_submission_datetime
text: https://cdr.ffiec.gov/public/Files/SIS611_-_Retrieve_Public_Data_via_Web_Service.pdf

title: Retrieve Filers Submission Date Time — get_filers_submission_datetime
code: if (!no_creds_available()) {   # Assume you have set the following environment variables:   # - FFIEC_USER_ID   # - FFIEC_BEARER_TOKEN    # Retrieve filers since 2025-03-31, as of 2025-04-15 and return as a tibble   get_filers_submission_datetime(     reporting_period_end_date = "03/31/2025",     last_update_date_time = "04/15/2025"   )    # Retrieve filers since 2025-03-31, as of 2025-04-15 21:00:00.000 and return   # as a list   get_filers_submission_datetime(     reporting_period_end_date = "03/31/2025",     last_update_date_time = "04/15/2025 21:00:00.000",     as_data_frame = FALSE   ) }

title: Retrieve Panel of Reporters — get_panel_of_reporters
text: Retrieves filer information FFIEC Central Data Repository API financial institutions Panel Reporters (POR) expected file given Call reporting period.

title: Retrieve Panel of Reporters — get_panel_of_reporters
code: get_panel_of_reporters(   user_id = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_USER_ID"),   bearer_token = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_BEARER_TOKEN"),   reporting_period_end_date,   as_data_frame = TRUE )

title: Retrieve Panel of Reporters — get_panel_of_reporters
text: user_id (String) UserID authenticating FFIEC API bearer_token (String) Bearer Token authenticating FFIEC API reporting_period_end_date (String) reporting period end date, formatted "MM/DD/YYYY". as_data_frame (Logical) result returned tibble? Default TRUE.

title: Retrieve Panel of Reporters — get_panel_of_reporters
text: tibble containing parsed JSON response API filer information since given reporting_period_end_date date value. as_data_frame = FALSE, result returned nested list object, element represents unique ID_RSSD value.

title: Retrieve Panel of Reporters — get_panel_of_reporters
text: https://cdr.ffiec.gov/public/Files/SIS611_-_Retrieve_Public_Data_via_Web_Service.pdf

title: Retrieve Panel of Reporters — get_panel_of_reporters
code: if (!no_creds_available()) {   # Assume you have set the following environment variables:   # - FFIEC_USER_ID   # - FFIEC_BEARER_TOKEN    # Retrieve expected filers for reporting period 2025-03-31 and return as a   # tibble   get_panel_of_reporters(     reporting_period_end_date = "03/31/2025"   )    # Retrieve expected filers for reporting period 2025-03-31 and return as a   # list   get_panel_of_reporters(     reporting_period_end_date = "03/31/2025",     as_data_frame = FALSE   ) }

title: Retrieve Reporting Periods — get_reporting_periods
text: Retrieves Call Report UBPR filer information FFIEC Central Data Repository API available reporating periods.

title: Retrieve Reporting Periods — get_reporting_periods
code: get_reporting_periods(   user_id = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_USER_ID"),   bearer_token = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_BEARER_TOKEN"),   as_data_frame = FALSE )  get_ubpr_reporting_periods(   user_id = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_USER_ID"),   bearer_token = Sys.getenv("FFIEC_BEARER_TOKEN"),   as_data_frame = FALSE )

title: Retrieve Reporting Periods — get_reporting_periods
text: user_id (String) UserID authenticating FFIEC API bearer_token (String) Bearer Token authenticating FFIEC API as_data_frame (Logical) result returned tibble? Default FALSE.

title: Retrieve Reporting Periods — get_reporting_periods
text: list containing parsed JSON response API, element list represents available reporting period. as_data_frame = TRUE, list converted tibble (returned ).

title: Retrieve Reporting Periods — get_reporting_periods
text: https://cdr.ffiec.gov/public/Files/SIS611_-_Retrieve_Public_Data_via_Web_Service.pdf

title: Retrieve Reporting Periods — get_reporting_periods
code: if (!no_creds_available()) {   # Assume you have set the following environment variables:   # - FFIEC_USER_ID   # - FFIEC_BEARER_TOKEN    # Retrieve reporting periods and return as a list   get_reporting_periods()    # Retrieve UBPR reporting periods and return as a tibble   get_ubpr_reporting_periods(as_data_frame = TRUE) }
